name: CADSTAR PCB Archive File
summary: Learn about .CPA files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: CPA files are usually exported from .PCB files created in CADSTAR. CPA files can also be imported and exported using Altium Designer, another PCB design application.

description: CAD file created by CADSTAR, an application used to create printed circuit board (PCB) designs; may contain a PCB design or a PCB component library; used for exporting, importing, and archiving designs.
